redeyereduction: Yes; with Red Eye Reduction Lamp
whitebalancing: Auto White balance with the imaging sensor, settings: AWB, Daylight, Shade, Cloudy, Tungsten, White, Fluorescent light, Flash, Custom. White balance compensation: 1. Blue/Amber +/-9, 2. Magenta/Green +/-9
shootingmodes: Aperture Priority, Close-Up, Creative Auto, Landscape, Manual, Movie, Night Portrait, No Flash, Portrait, Program, Scene Intelligent Auto, Shutter Priority, Sports
viewfinder: Pentamirror, Built-in diopter adjustment (-3 to +1 m-)
